title: x/tools/refactor/rename: Unterminated single quote in usage string.
body:
[rename.go#L103](https://github.com/golang/tools/blob/f53a5581bc2fdd52820df86cbfd8483816fe8bcc/refactor/rename/rename.go#L103) currently has:

```
% gorename -from \"bytes\".Buffer.Len' -to Size
```

It has an unterminated single quote. It should be fixed either by adding a single quote in front (and not escaping the double quotes):

```
% gorename -from '"bytes".Buffer.Len' -to Size
```

Or by removing the existing single quote:

```
% gorename -from \"bytes\".Buffer.Len -to Size
```
